name: ME1609_VT21_final_DanielHåkansson
description:
Link to background: https://pngtree.com/freebackground/fantasy-fairy-forest-background-material_9927...

WASD or arrowkeys to move

R to restart, losing all checkpoints

ESC to quit the game

Hope you'll enjoy! My current best time beating it is 5 minutes, but I expect it to go smoother for others playing.
